enumerationMembers.label: ReservationCancelled
enumerationMembers.comment: The status for a previously confirmed reservation that is now cancelled.

enumerationMembers.label: ReservationConfirmed
enumerationMembers.comment: The status of a confirmed reservation.

enumerationMembers.label: ReservationHold
enumerationMembers.comment: The status of a reservation on hold pending an update like credit card number or flight changes.

enumerationMembers.label: ReservationPending
enumerationMembers.comment: The status of a reservation when a request has been sent, but not confirmed.
